about_the_game:
The 18+ Costume - Yukari DLC contains the following:

Unlocks Yukari Gym & Bikini Costumes
(needs to be bought with LewdCoins)
2500 Purple Matter
100 Flowers (Dating Gift)
50 Chocolates (Dating Gift)
50 Knives (Dating Gift)
300 Red Globbloppers
300 Yellow Globbloppers
300 Blue Globbloppers
300 Green Globbloppers
10 000 LewdCoins

- Starts the 18+CostumeYukari Generator in the Lab.

DLC can be claimed in-game once bought. Please restart the game if you are not able to claim it.
DLC can be claimed once per savegame. You can claim it again if you start a new save game or reset your game.

Thank you for your support!

content_descriptors.notes: The base game has depictions of anime looking woman with showing some cleavage. The game offers DLC content that shows complete nudity.
